extensionAttribute.description: returns CFBundleShortVersionString string for Self Service+
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/bash
SelfServicePlusVertion=""
if [ -f /Applications/Self\ Service+.app/Contents/Info.plist ] then SelfServicePlusVertion=$(defaults read /Applications/Self\ Service+.app/Contents/Info.plist CFBundleShortVersionString 2>/dev/null) fi
echo "<result>$SelfServicePlusVertion</result>"
exit 0
